text: Caesar3:1 Rome gi Ningthourel Tiberius-na panba chahi taramangasuba chahida Pontius Pilate-na Judea-gi leingak mapu, Herodna Galilee-gi leingakpa3:1 Tetrarch: Lam amagi saruk mari thokpagi amagi leingakpa. amasung manaonupa Philipna Iturea amadi Trachonitis-ki leingakpa; Lysanias-na Abilene-gi leingakpa,
